event.description: Justin Leeson lines out to center fielder Corey Brown.
Paul Bello doubles (1) on a ground ball to left fielder Xavier Paul.
Mike Garza grounds out to first baseman Tyler Moore. Paul Bello to 3rd.
Danny Poplawski strikes out swinging.
Kevin Johnson lines out to right fielder Bryce Harper.
Corbin Blakey grounds out, shortstop Andres Blanco to first baseman Tyler Moore.
Christian Venditti grounds out, pitcher Matt Purke to first baseman Tyler Moore.
Jim Laufer called out on strikes.
Andy Lentz grounds out, shortstop Andres Blanco to first baseman Tyler Moore.
Justin Leeson called out on strikes.
Pitcher Change: Rafael Martin replaces Matt Purke.
Paul Bello called out on strikes.
Mike Garza pops out to third baseman Anthony Rendon.
Danny Poplawski singles on a line drive to right fielder Bryce Harper.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Nick Geary replaces Kevin Johnson.
Nick Geary called out on strikes.
Defensive Substitution: Carlos Rivero replaces third baseman Anthony Rendon, batting 6th, playing third base.
Eury Perez remains in the game as the center fielder.
Defensive Substitution: Jeff Kobernus replaces second baseman Steve Lombardozzi, batting 1st, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Justin Bloxom replaces first baseman Tyler Moore, batting 4th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Zach Walters replaces shortstop Andres Blanco, batting 8th, playing shortstop.
Corbin Blakey strikes out swinging.
Christian Venditti grounds out, third baseman Carlos Rivero to first baseman Justin Bloxom.
Jim Laufer strikes out swinging.
Jarrett Hoffpauir remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Waldis Joaquin replaces Rafael Martin.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Steve Anderson replaces Andy Lentz.
Defensive Substitution: Michael Taylor replaces left fielder Xavier Paul, batting 2nd, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Destin Hood replaces right fielder Bryce Harper, batting 3rd, playing left field.
Steve Anderson singles on a ground ball to center fielder Eury Perez.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Max Friedman replaces Justin Leeson.
Max Friedman grounds into a force out, shortstop Zach Walters to second baseman Jeff Kobernus. Steve Anderson out at 2nd. Max Friedman to 1st.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Justin Abbott replaces Paul Bello.
With Justin Abbott batting, Max Friedman steals (1) 2nd base.
With Justin Abbott batting, passed ball by Sandy Leon, Max Friedman to 3rd.
Justin Abbott called out on strikes.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Ryan Busch replaces Mike Garza.
Ryan Busch grounds out, third baseman Carlos Rivero to first baseman Justin Bloxom.
Defensive Substitution: Jhonatan Solano replaces catcher Sandy Leon, batting 9th, playing catcher.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Trevor Matern replaces Danny Poplawski.
Trevor Matern strikes out swinging, catcher Jhonatan Solano to first baseman Justin Bloxom.
Nick Geary strikes out swinging.
Corbin Blakey grounds out, pitcher Waldis Joaquin to first baseman Justin Bloxom.
Pitcher Change: Austin Bibens-Dirkx replaces Waldis Joaquin.
Christian Venditti called out on strikes.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Nick Gianforte replaces Jim Laufer.
Nick Gianforte called out on strikes.
Steve Anderson strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Jeff Fulchino replaces Austin Bibens-Dirkx.
Max Friedman strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Roberto Rodriguez replaces Justin Abbott.
Roberto Rodriguez singles on a line drive to center fielder Eury Perez.
Ryan Busch pops out to first baseman Justin Bloxom in foul territory.
Trevor Matern grounds out, shortstop Zach Walters to first baseman Justin Bloxom.
Steve Lombardozzi flies out to left fielder Paul Bello.
Xavier Paul singles on a line drive to right fielder Christian Venditti. Xavier Paul advances to 2nd, on fielding error by right fielder Christian Venditti.
Bryce Harper walks.
Tyler Moore reaches on fielding error by third baseman Corbin Blakey. Xavier Paul to 3rd. Bryce Harper to 2nd.
Brett Carroll hit by pitch. Xavier Paul scores. Bryce Harper to 3rd. Tyler Moore to 2nd.
Anthony Rendon called out on strikes.
Corey Brown flies out to left fielder Paul Bello.
Pitcher Change: Thomas Polus replaces Will Harris.
Andres Blanco grounds out, third baseman Corbin Blakey to first baseman Danny Poplawski.
Sandy Leon grounds out, shortstop Mike Garza to first baseman Danny Poplawski.
Steve Lombardozzi walks.
With Xavier Paul batting, passed ball by Kevin Johnson, Steve Lombardozzi to 2nd.
Xavier Paul strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Jack Vander Linden replaces Thomas Polus.
Bryce Harper bunt grounds out, pitcher Jack Vander Linden to first baseman Danny Poplawski.
Tyler Moore doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Paul Bello.
Brett Carroll strikes out swinging.
Anthony Rendon flies out to center fielder Justin Leeson.
Nick Geary remains in the game as the catcher.
Pitcher Change: James Heine replaces Jack Vander Linden.
Corey Brown walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Eury Perez replaces Corey Brown.
Andres Blanco strikes out swinging. Eury Perez steals (1) 2nd base. Eury Perez advances to 3rd, on throwing error by catcher Nick Geary.
Sandy Leon out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Justin Leeson. Eury Perez scores.
Steve Lombardozzi flies out to left fielder Paul Bello.
Pitcher Change: Tommy Isaacs replaces James Heine.
Xavier Paul bunt grounds out, pitcher Tommy Isaacs to first baseman Danny Poplawski.
Bryce Harper flies out to right fielder Christian Venditti.
Justin Bloxom walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Jarrett Hoffpauir replaces Brett Carroll.
Jarrett Hoffpauir hit by pitch. Justin Bloxom to 2nd.
Carlos Rivero pops out to catcher Nick Geary.
Max Friedman remains in the game as the center fielder.
Justin Abbott remains in the game as the left fielder.
Ryan Busch remains in the game as the shortstop.
Steve Anderson remains in the game as the second baseman.
Pitcher Change: Billy Cosmopulos replaces Tommy Isaacs.
Eury Perez reaches on throwing error by third baseman Corbin Blakey. Eury Perez to 2nd.
Zach Walters singles on a ground ball to center fielder Max Friedman. Eury Perez scores.
Sandy Leon grounds into a force out, first baseman Danny Poplawski to shortstop Ryan Busch. Zach Walters out at 2nd. Sandy Leon to 1st.
Jeff Kobernus singles on a line drive to right fielder Christian Venditti. Sandy Leon to 2nd.
Michael Taylor flies out to left fielder Justin Abbott.
Destin Hood walks. Sandy Leon to 3rd. Jeff Kobernus to 2nd.
Justin Bloxom grounds into a force out, second baseman Steve Anderson to shortstop Ryan Busch. Destin Hood out at 2nd.
Trevor Matern remains in the game as the first baseman.
Pitcher Change: Charles Steinman replaces Billy Cosmopulos, batting 5th.
Defensive Substitution: Jim Laufer remains in the game as the catcher, batting 8th.
Jarrett Hoffpauir singles on a line drive to center fielder Max Friedman.
Carlos Rivero flies out to left fielder Justin Abbott.
Eury Perez grounds into double play, third baseman Corbin Blakey to second baseman Steve Anderson to first baseman Trevor Matern. Jarrett Hoffpauir out at 2nd.
Pitcher Change: Pablo Vinent replaces Charles Steinman, batting 5th.
Defensive Substitution: Jim Laufer replaces catcher Jim Laufer, batting 8th, playing catcher.
Zach Walters strikes out swinging.
Jhonatan Solano hit by pitch.
Jeff Kobernus walks. Jhonatan Solano to 2nd.
Michael Taylor grounds out, third baseman Corbin Blakey to first baseman Trevor Matern. Jhonatan Solano to 3rd. Jeff Kobernus to 2nd.
Destin Hood pops out to catcher Jim Laufer in foul territory.
